div.h2: Our mission is "to educate, empower, and inspire all learners".
div.p: We invite and encourage you to tour our Early Childhood/K-5 and 6-12 building sites to visit with our supportive staff and view excellence in education, all in a comfortable relaxed small school atmosphere.

South Terrace Elementary School, Room #5
